entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
